walletConnectionError.title: Connection error
walletConnectionError.description: Failed to connect to your TON wallet.

userNotFoundError.title: Could not find user
userNotFoundError.description: User with specified username is not found. Maybe you want to sign up?

unauthorizedError.title: Signature incorrect
unauthorizedError.description: The wallet signature of this account does not match yours. Try to connect another wallet.

walletNotInitialized.title: Wallet not initialized
walletNotInitialized.description: Your TON wallet is not initialized. Please, create outcome transaction and try again.
